revised_title: The Establishment and Growth of the Lister Institute of Preventive Medicine
tldr: The article recounts the history of the Lister Institute of Preventive Medicine, from its initial establishment in London to its growth and eventual relocation to Chelsea Bridge Road. The Institute was founded to promote scientific investigation into infectious diseases and the development of protective and curative materials. The article highlights the challenges faced by the Institute, including opposition from anti-vivisectionists and the need to obtain a license for animal experiments.
